posts.post_title: T200 New York AL Yankees PSA 4 FS - Lower Price!
posts.post_content:
Tough key card in great shape - $2000 dlvd.  First email to [url]jwondowski@aol.com[/url] that says "I'll take it" gets it.  I have other teams if you are interested - send an email.

Thank you.

John
Extremely tough card in beautiful condition. Good luck w the sale.
